description.original: Import Word files easily. Adds a preview mode for .docx files and the ability to convert them to markdown (.md) files.
description.translation: Import Word files easily. Adds a preview mode for .docx files and the ability to convert them to markdown (.md) files.

dict..setDesc(\"Delete source file after pres: .setDesc("Delete source file after pressing the conversion button.")
dict..setDesc(\"Import comments from docx fil: .setDesc("Import comments from docx files using reference links. Comments will be placed at the end of the markdown file.")
dict..setDesc(\"Settings related to attachmen: .setDesc("Settings related to attachments extracted during file conversion.")
dict..setDesc(\"Fallback name if the attachme: .setDesc("Fallback name if the attachment file has no alt text or is written using only invalid characters.")
dict..setDesc(\"Specify the destination for a: .setDesc("Specify the destination for attachments extracted during file conversion.")
dict..setDesc(\"Specify the name of the folde: .setDesc("Specify the name of the folder where attachments will be extracted.")
dict..innerText = \"This is a preview. To edi: .innerText = "This is a preview. To edit, convert it to markdown."
